Title: The Damned Thing
Plot: The Damned Thing is the apocalyptic tale of a mysterious creature that terrorizes a small Texas town.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains horror, graphic violence and offensive language
GuestStars: Sean Patrick Flanery, Marisa Coughlan, Ted Raimi, Ted Friend, Ocean Hellman, Eileen Barrett, Tracy Waterhouse, Brendan Fletcher, Ryan Drescher, Brent Stait, Georgia Craig, Alex Ferris
